name: Stroll (MichaelBelousov)
description:
For the Sonic Workflow's Valentine's Day Jam.
Theme was Cringe + the a picture of "The Creation of Adam"
This was our first jam, we crammed hard but many of us lacked experience. We still
got something cool done we think, albeit with glaring 0 polish.
Maybe next time quality over quantity.

There is no victory condition. Just explore :)
We uploaded a broken version (all dialogues crash) because we could not otherwise put one up on time. We will look into a fix but it's at the engine level. For now we know that it works if you run the game with the verbose command line flag (e.g. Stroll.exe -v)

We will be releasing an accompanying album since during the jam we didn't have the manpower to code transitions to many of the excellent tracks our audio producer made.

We may revisit this at some point.

A few open assets were used and remixed, they are listed in the README.
